isString: The {property} field must be a string
isNumber: The {property} field must be a number
isPositive: The {property} field must be a positive number
isMaxLength: The {property} field must have a maximum of {max} characters
isMinLength: The {property} field must have a minimum of {min} characters
isNumberString: The {property} field must be a number
isEmail: The {property} field must be an email

matches.lowercase: The {property} field must contain at least one lowercase letter
matches.uppercase: The {property} field must contain at least one uppercase letter
matches.number: The {property} field must contain at least one number
matches.spacial: The {property} field must contain at least one special character

isEnum: The {property} field must be one of the following values: {enumValues}
isBoolean: The {property} field must be a boolean
